meanings.definition: Having the most fat or flesh; fattest.
meanings.sent1: The cat looked the tubbiest among all the pets in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: She pointed to the tubbiest pumpkin in the patch.
meanings.sent3: The tubbiest squirrel in the park always wins the nut-gathering race.
meanings.sent4: The tubbiest cloud in the sky seemed to be bursting with rain.
meanings.sent5: The tubbiest teddy bear at the fair was impossible to resist hugging.
